name: Chonky Bam
description:
**Highly Recommend You Play A Download Version For Fullscreen & Optimal Experience**

Chonky Bam is the last of the great bubba apes left in the wild. Deranged zookeepers have him cornered on the edge. Typically a peaceful creature, Chonky must turn to barrel tossing and ground-bamming to stay out of captivity.

Mouse Controls

< Arrow to throw left > Arrow to throw right Bam Button to slam the floor R Key to reset the game if there are any bugs

Gameplay

Yellow Bananas improve your barrel's resilience Green Bananas decrease your recovery time between actions Red zookeepers are tricky, they'll leap over your barrels Green Zookepeers can't jump, but they're faster

Share your high-score. I'll update this description with the current record holder. Right now the insanely high record is by bl4st :

Apologies if the Mac builds won't run for you. It worked fine, both zip and dmg on my machine, but something to do with Xcode and my certs ... it may not work on other Macs.
